definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
surname Long/short for 吉隆坡[Ji2 long2 po1], Kuala Lumpur
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: For the application of somatic cell nuclear transfer (SCNT), low cloning efficiency is a great barrier.
sentences.chinese: 效率低下對體細胞克隆技術的應用形成了巨大的障礙。

sentences.english: Great achievements have been made in the technology for plant gene isolation.
sentences.chinese: 近年來植物基因克隆技術已經取得了很大進展。

sentences.english: Wilmut wanted to use his cloning technology to improve livestock.
sentences.chinese: 威爾瑪特想用克隆技術來改良牲畜。

sentences.english: Professor Lance, your lecture on cloning is very inspiring!
sentences.chinese: 蘭斯教授，聽了您有關克隆技術的講座，我深受啓發。

sentences.english: Cloning techniques were vital to the production of the pigs.
sentences.chinese: 克隆技術是培育這些豬的關鍵。

sentences.english: Second, could the said technology satisfy the substantive requirements of patentability?
sentences.chinese: 人類克隆技術能否滿足可享專利性的實質條件。

sentences.english: A: What do you think of cloning?
